Segment.name: CLD
Segment.comment: To specify the number of material loads shipped

Field.name: NumberOfLoads
Field.comment: Number of customer-defined loads shipped by the supplier

Field.name: NumberOfUnitsShipped
Field.comment: Numeric value of units shipped in manufacturer's shipping units for a line item or transaction set

Field.name: PackagingCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of packaging; Part 1: Packaging Form, Part 2: Packaging Material; if the Data Element is used, then Part 1 is always required

Field.name: Size
Field.comment: Size of supplier units in pack

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken
